ingredients: .25-.5 lbs-American Chocolate (Here you can make this less or more "chocolatey." You could use Dark Chocolate if you prefer or .25 lbs-American Chocolate more for color than flhavor...it depends on what type of chocolate flavor you prefer. You could leave out the chocolate as well, it is still very good.)
2tsp-Pumpkin Pie Spice. I used McCormick but any will do.
8-10 lb pumpkin if you really want that pumpkin flavor. I used 8 an pounder.
name: Samhain Pumpkin Ale (Chocolate Kick)
